commands.shrines.help:
Restart your game to make changes aktive
%s
commands.shrines.help.tooltip: Opens a link to a help website
commands.shrines.add.failed: Failed to add new structure, because %s already exists
commands.shrines.add.success:
Successfully added new structure [%s]
%s
Restart to make changes aktive
commands.shrines.add.success.help.toolti: Click here to get configure command
commands.shrines.remove.failed: Failed to remove [%s] because there was no custom structure with this name
commands.shrines.remove.success:
Succesfully removed custom structure %s
Restart your game to make the changes aktive
commands.shrines.configure.failed.struct: Failed to configure structure [%s] because it doesn't exists
commands.shrines.configure.failed.option: Failed to configure %s because %s is not a valid option
commands.shrines.configure.failed.wrong_: Failed to configure, because [%s] is not a valid value for option [%s]
commands.shrines.configure.failed.dist_l: Failed to configure, because distance [%s] must be larger than seperation [%s]
commands.shrines.configure.failed.sep_sm: Failed to configure, because seperation [%s] must be smaller than distance [%s]
commands.shrines.configure.failed.chance: Failed to configure, because spawn_chance [%s] is out of range (0.0 - 1.0)
commands.shrines.configure.failed.seed_s: Inverted seed because it was negative
Used random seed because seed was 0
commands.shrines.query.option.failed: Failed to query config of %s because no such structure exists
commands.shrines.failure.no_name_match: ERROR: Name argument was invalid; there is no structure with name [%s]
commands.shrines.failure.name_match: ERROR: Name argument was invalid; there is already a structure with name [%s]
commands.shrines.failure.option: ERROR: Option argument was invalid; there is no option with name [%s]
commands.shrines.failure.lower_case: Your given %s was not in lower case but should be, using lower case version now
commands.shrines.resource.success.added: SUCCESS: Added structure pieces and activated them. Restart the game and your changes will be active
commands.shrines.resource.success.prepar:
SUCCESS: Prepared structure piece bounds of %s and drawed them (if you have this mod on client)
Do you wish to use these bounds?
%s or %s
Runs a command that saves your pieces and add them to your structure
Suggests a command to change bound size of your structure
commands.shrines.load.failed: FAILED: Can't load structure [%s] to position [%s]
commands.shrines.failure.category: Such an biome category doesn't exist
commands.shrines.query.option.value.fail: Failed to read option [%s] of [%s] because no such option exists
commands.shrines.dimension.success.add: SUCCESS: This structure can now spawn in %s
commands.shrines.dimension.failed.add: FAILED: This structure can already spawn in %s
commands.shrines.dimension.success.remov: SUCCES: This structure can no longer spawn in %s
commands.shrines.dimension.failed.remove: FAILED: This structure can't spawn in %s'
gui.shrines.structures.title: Shrines Structures
gui.shrines.structures.config.title: Change configuration of "%s"
gui.shrines.structures.add.title: Add a new custom structure
gui.shrines.config.spawn_chance.tooltip: The chance to spawn this structure, when a valid place was found
gui.shrines.config.needs_ground.tooltip: If true, the structures becomes a ground of the biome material if there is no
gui.shrines.config.distance.tooltip: The highest distance of the structures to try to spawn this structure (in chunks)
gui.shrines.config.seperation.tooltip: The lowest distance of the structures to try to spawn this structure (in chunks)
gui.shrines.config.seed.tooltip: Used for the random to generate this structure. If this is equals to any other seed, the structures will spawn at the same place
gui.shrines.config.categories.tooltip: These biome are categories. This structure can spawn in every selected category
gui.shrines.config.blacklist.tooltip: A list of biomes where this structure can't generate in'
gui.shrines.config.dimensions.tooltip: A list of dimensions this structure can spawn in (customs may not work well) (only available from worlds)
gui.shrines.config.use_random_varianting: Replace some materials of this structures randomly with others
gui.shrines.config.loot_chance.tooltip: The chance that in the chests(or other containers) is loot
gui.shrines.config.name: Name
gui.shrines.config.name.tooltip: The name of the custom structure to indicate (can't be empty and there should only be lower case characters)
gui.shrines.config.pieces.tooltip: The source of the structure (only available from worlds)
gui.shrines.config.ignore_air.tooltip: Your boxes of source contains air. This indicates weather these air blocks should be placed or not
gui.shrines.config.base_height_offset.to: The offset from the ground (positive and negative is allowed)
gui.shrines.structures.removeQuestion: Are you, sure that you want to delete "%s" from disk?
gui.shrines.structures.removeWarning: It will be lost forever (A very long time)
gui.shrines.structures.resources.choose: Choose resources to use for this structure
gui.shrines.structures.resources.out_of_: The selected resources are out of range
gui.shrines.structures.resources.invalid: The selected resources contains an invalid chararacter
gui.shrines.structures.resource.save.sta: Started to save resources. Work in progress
config.shrines.blacklist.tooltip: Biomes where no Structures of this mod can generate in. Custom structures inclusive
config.shrines.distance_factor.tooltip: This is multilied on the distance of every structure. Allows to change spawn distance of every structure at once
config.shrines.seperation_factor.tooltip: This is multilied on the seperation of every structure. Allows to change spawn seperation of every structure at once
config.shrines.structure_min_distance.to: The structures min. distance is the smallest possible distance between two structures (of this mod)
config.shrines.advanced_logging.tooltip: Use advanced logging. Helps more with finding issues. Please enable this before reporting a bug
